conversations.conversation:
Welcome to Tempebasah.Com ;media technology today; – Learn, Understand and Explore the facts of computer technology. ;Tempebasah.Com; – ;This blog; is all about technology and gadget.
;
;I am from Jakarta, Indonesia. I just started this blog as a hobby and to share what I know. Later due to increase in the visitor’s response I took blogging a bit more seriously…
;
;I have a passion towards the computer technology. I am so much addicted to my PC and can’t live without it. Most of the time I live on my PC. Some times even more than 15 Hours/Day. Programming is my passion. I always want to explore and come up with the new ideas. So here on this blog I’ll share my ideas with you. Not only me every one can share their knowledge and ideas on this blog. This blog is wide open to suggestions and feedback.
;I love Programing and computer technology. Don’t You?
;Your contribution & our discipline will make it successful. I hope you all enjoy this blog. Don’t forget to express your opinion through comments.
;
;;tempebasah.com; – ;media technology today;
